newsitem.title: UK: Cazenove Indian GDR Index edges higher.
newsitem.headline: Cazenove Indian GDR Index edges higher.

text.p: The Cazenove Indian GDR Index was up 0.78 point or 1.08 percent at 72.74 after the Bombay Stock Exchange 30 share index ended 51.71 points or 1.56 percent up at a provisional 3,375.93.
The premium for GDRs over stocks on the local market was 11.99 percent after 11.69 percent on Monday.
The Cazenove index is a capitalisation weighted basket of Indian global depositary receipts and measures the change from midday on the previous trading day to midday today.
